patthana20.1:5.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:5.2: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:5.3: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana20.1:6.1: Nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:6.2: Nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:6.3: Nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana20.1:7.1: Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:7.2: Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:7.3: Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:8.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.1:10.1: Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:10.2: Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:10.3: Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.1:11.1: Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:11.2: Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:11.3: Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.1:12.1: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:12.2: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:12.3: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.1:13.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.1:14.1: Nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:15.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.1:16.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:18.1: Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:20.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:21.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.
